summary: Broke and in debt, an otherwise honest cowboy gets mixed up in some shady dealings with a crooked rancher.
cast: Paul Newman|Lee Marvin|Strother Martin|Wayne Rogers|Hector Elizondo|Christine Belford|Kelly Jean Peters|Gregory Sierra|Fred Graham|Matt Clark|Claudio Miranda|Bruce Davis Bayne|Richard Farnsworth|Ken Freehill|Terrence Malick
title: Los indeseables
